name: Stopper Copter
description:
The game takes place during a freak series of disasters all across America. After the San Andreas Earthquake occurred, the Golden Gate bridge was destroyed. The only way to get anywhere in the US is by helicopter. Playing as a military pilot, you save the lives of many civilians in this game. The player can fly around the cities, fire a grappling hook, and shoot at hostiles. The main goal for the player is to save lives and defeat hostilities.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Control the Copter

Space Bar - Fire the Copter's mini gun

Shift Key - Deploys the grappling hook
